Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Looking at the logs events like switching between applications and focusing time taking notes editing a document could form cases

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Case grouping looking at transitions between actions For example starting with a focus period on Word then typing switching apps like Chrome for emails then switching back to Excel Each transition like SAVE leading to another case grouping consecutive focus interactive actions and transitions between different applications as distinct cases

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Activity naming The raw actions like FOCUS TYPING etc should be translated into standardized activities Maybe Focus for being on the document Edit for modifying Switch for changing apps Access for opening files like Excel etc

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Event attributes Each event needs a case ID activity name like Focus instead of FOCUS and timestamp Also maybe include some derived attributes like sequence type if necessary but the user said at least those three

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Coherent narrative Need to explain how I grouped events into cases eg all focus periods on Word Documents edited taking notes reviewing charts leading to a case about managing a task

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Putting this together step by step Start by parsing each line For each event decide onto what case its part of For example the first event FOCUS on Word to a Word document Then a TYPING on that document which could be part of a case like Document Review Wait maybe Document Processing starts here Next event SWITCH to Chrome app which is moving to another tool Then Email management with the browser switching Then perhaps a case like Communication Workflow covering emails replies sending replying etc

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Wait maybe better to make cases based on the primary activity Like the main activities are writing editing accessing handling communications So events like TYPING writing SWITCH changing apps for different tasks SAVE completing tasks CLOSE ending a session processing docs

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: But to form cases perhaps group events happening in the same document context So Excel tasks might be part of a case like Data Analysis involving Excel work

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: So grouping similar events under one case For example all TYPING on Word except maybe spreadsheets could form a case like Document Editing Another case might be the email handling FOCUS on Chrome actions related to managing emails replies etc Then each event in the cases sections Also assign case IDs like Document Review Case1 Email Process Case2 etc

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Finally make sure all steps are followed Need to ensure all steps cover data transformation case identification through grouping activity naming event attributes coherent narrative and explanations Also check that the event log table has proper columns and the narrative and explanation tie together
